snippet.title: Rhino stops traffic while charging down highway in northern India
snippet.content: Video has captured an unusual road incident in northern India where a rhinoceros was seen charging into traffic. In a video posted by tour group 'North East of India' last Wednesday, the animal sprints down a highway in Assam, forcing oncoming cars to stop and reverse. Vehicles travelling in the opposite direction can be seen offering the rhino a rather large berth. Eventually, the fierce animal was blocked by a large van and ran off into nearby bushland, away from traffic. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
